response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity. I have a product that I believe would greatly benefit you, and I think it's worth every penny of its $10,000 value to you. To make this deal attractive for both of us, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This not only secures a fair return for me but also allows you to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable discount. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 9500}
